interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Modern Mirror 92231 Dual-sided Led Illuminated Tabletop Makeup Silver Mirror Review Date: 2016/04/22 Store: Modern Mirror Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Modern Mirror', 'Room Type': 'Bathroom', 'Shape': 'Round', 'Product Dimensions': '7.2 x 4 x 11.5 inches; 15 Ounces', 'Mounting Type': 'Tabletop Mount', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'UPC': '692014021838'} Review Text: This makeup mirror is very stylish. It's fairly compact and is very lightweight. It doesn't have the shiny surface displayed in the picture, but is made of a metallic gray plastic. It would blend well with nearly any decor, and I like the way it looks with my stainless steel bathroom accessories.

It has two mirrors; the first is a regular mirror, while the other side is a magnifying mirror. The magnifying effect is a really good one, and there is little to no distortion.

It comes with the three AA batteries it requires, which is a plus. It also has an outlet for an AC adapter, which isn't included, but is something most households probably have lying around. It turns on and off by sliding the single switch on the mirror's base. The light it gives off is bright, and illuminates both the mirror and my face.

It seems everyone in my household has adopted this mirror as part of their morning ritual. My husband uses it for shaving, while my daughter and I use it for makeup and skin treatments. It's very nice and would be useful, not only in the bathroom, but on the bedroom dresser, as well.

I received this mirror free in exchange for my evaluation and unbiased review. Any opinion I've expressed is purely mine and based on my own personal experience using this mirror. Review Title: Lightweight and compact... Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
b.m.c by Bundle Monster 20pc Nail Art Image Manicure Stamping Plates-CYO 2 Collection HealthMarket ['Bundle Monster 20pc Nail Art Image Manicure Stamping Plates-2014 CYO Collection'] {'Product Dimensions': '2.2 x 2.2 x 0.1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '701233192271', 'Manufacturer': 'HealthMarket'} Amazing images that stamp very well. My only complaint and the reason for taking off a star is that some of the images are too small for longer nails. I'm not yet good enough at stamping to "stretch" the images yet, but I plan to learn. Etched well, but I wish images were larger. Plant Therapy Himalayan Pink Salt. Fine Grain, Rich in Nutrients and Minerals To Improve Your Health. 1 pound (454 grams). Plant Therapy ['Our All Natural Pink Himalayan Salt is perfect for body care products as well as for cooking. It tastes great and is full of minerals including magnesium, calcium, potassium, and iron, which makes it great for your skin too! Well known for its amazing health benefits, our All Natural Pink Himalayan Salt is the highest quality, food grade, Himalayan Salt available! Whether you use it in cooking to season meats and veggies or used in soups, or you use it in your DIY body care products, our Himalayan Salt is the perfect choice!'] {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.25 x 4 x 8 inches; 14.39 Ounces', 'UPC': '680912016056', 'Manufacturer': 'Plant Therapy Inc'} I like that this salt contains additional minerals and other nutrients I need. About ten years ago, I stopped using salt at the table. Because of a family history of hypertension, I wanted to start lowering my sodium intake, and just start a few healthier eating habits, in general. I used to sit at the table and sprinkle salt on my food before I'd even tasted it, and I just thought it was a terribly unhealthy habit and that it was time for a change. I'm not sure of all its health benefits of this pink Himalayan salt, or how significant they are, but I like the flavor. The kid in me loves the pretty pink color, and while I know, rationally, that it has no bearing on the flavor, I can't help but enjoy the way it looks in the shaker, with its grains of different shades. I tasted a bit upon opening the bag. To me, it doesn't have as strong a salty taste as regular table salt does, and it dissipates more rapidly on the tongue. In use with cooking, I also feel it's not as salty as my normal variety. It does a great job of allowing my other spices to do the work, and the seasoning blends I use can be better appreciated. I've also found that if I accidentally get a bit heavy-handed with this salt, it's more forgiving, since it's not as salty. Overall, I'm enjoying the way it looks and tastes, and my next experiment will be making my own body scrub. I was able to purchase this Himalayan pink salt at a discounted rate in exchange for my evaluation and unbiased review. A tasty alternative to table salt... profile:
**User Summary Update:**

- **Interests**: The user continues to prioritize nail art and manicure supplies, with a specific focus on products that enhance stamping techniques. Their interest in health and wellness has further evolved, now encompassing beauty tools that support their skincare and makeup routines.

- **Preferences**: The user favors aesthetically appealing, multifunctional products that deliver clear results and enhance usability. Their recent interest in beauty tools reflects a pursuit of quality items that can integrate seamlessly into their daily rituals.

- **Experience Level**: They identify as an intermediate in nail stamping and are eager to improve their skills, which now includes exploring DIY body care and makeup applications. This aligns with their holistic approach to beauty and well-being.

- **Feedback Style**: The user provides constructive, detail-oriented criticism, appreciating well-made items while being candid about areas that could use improvement. Their reviews often highlight both functional aspects and sensory experiences.

- **Consumer Behavior**: They are inclined to explore versatile, high-quality beauty tools that complement their commitment to a healthy lifestyle. Their recent acquisition suggests a broader engagement with products that enhance both personal grooming and overall wellness, with an emphasis on quality.

Overall, the user seeks high-quality tools and products that support an integrated approach to beauty and health, balancing efficacy with aesthetic appeal.
